meanings.definition: Give information or direction to someone
meanings.sent1: The teacher instructs the students on how to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent2: She instructs her team on the safety procedures before they start working.
meanings.sent3: The robot instructs the curious cat on how to catch a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: His calm voice instructs the waves to retreat from the shore.
meanings.sent5: The wise owl instructs the young birds on how to fly gracefully.

meanings.sent1: The coach instructs the players on the proper way to kick the ball.
meanings.sent2: Parents often instruct their children on good manners and behavior.
meanings.sent3: The clown instructs the audience on how to juggle imaginary balls.
meanings.sent4: Her melody instructs the flowers to bloom in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The experienced chef instructs the new cooks on the secret recipe.

meanings.sent1: The general instructs the soldiers on the battle strategy.
meanings.sent2: The manager instructs the employees to complete the tasks by the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: The magician instructs the rabbit to disappear but it refuses to listen.
meanings.sent4: His presence instructs respect from all who meet him.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse instructs ships safely through the stormy seas.
